an10.81:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā campāyaṃ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre.
an10.81:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā vāhano yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.81:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā vāhano bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.81:4.5: “katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi tathāgato nissaṭo visaṃyutto vippamutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharatī”ti?
an10.81:5.1: “Dasahi kho, vāhana, dhammehi tathāgato nissaṭo visaṃyutto vippamutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharati.
an10.81:5.3: Rūpena kho, vāhana, tathāgato nissaṭo visaṃyutto vippamutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharati, vedanāya kho, vāhana … pe …
an10.81:5.11: kilesehi kho, vāhana, tathāgato nissaṭo visaṃyutto vippamutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharati.
an10.81:5.12: Seyyathāpi, vāhana, uppalaṃ vā padumaṃ vā puṇḍarīkaṃ vā udake jātaṃ udake saṃvaḍḍhaṃ udakā paccuggamma ṭhitaṃ anupalittaṃ udakena;
an10.81:5.13: evamevaṃ kho, vāhana, imehi dasahi dhammehi tathāgato nissaṭo visaṃyutto vippamutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharatī”ti.
